name: 強行高速輸送部隊を編成せよ！
detail: 「川内改二」旗艦、「江風改二」「時雨改二」他駆逐2隻による水雷戦隊を編成せよ！
title: Form a Forced High-Speed Transport Force!
desc: Have Sendai Kai Ni as flagship, Kawakaze Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni and 2 DD in your fleet.

name: 新編「水雷戦隊」を含む艦隊を再編成せよ！
detail: 軽巡級を旗艦とした駆逐艦4隻からなる強力な水雷戦隊を含む艦隊を再編成せよ！
title: Reform the Fleet Composition Into a New Torpedo Squadron!
desc: Have a CL/CLT/CT as flagship and 4 DD in any fleet.

name: 新編「第八駆逐隊」を再編成せよ！
detail: 「朝潮改二」を旗艦とした「満潮」「大潮」「荒潮」4隻による第八駆逐隊を再編成せよ！
title: Reform the New 8th Destroyer Division!
desc: Have ONLY Asashio Kai Ni (or Kai Ni D) as flagship, Michishio, Ooshio and Arashio in your fleet.
memo: If you meet the conditions and it doesn't clear, switch the quest off and turn it on again.

name: 精鋭！八駆第一小隊！
detail: 「朝潮改二丁」及び「大潮改二」を含む艦隊を編成せよ！
title: Elite! DesDiv 8, 1st platoon!
desc: Have Asashio Kai Ni D and Ooshio Kai Ni in your fleet.
memo:
If you meet the conditions and it doesn't clear, switch the quest off and turn it on again.
Rewards an Irako and 3 Screws

name: 「第十九駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
detail: 特型駆逐艦「磯波」「浦波」「綾波」「敷波」4隻による第十九駆逐隊を編成せよ！
title: Form the 19th Destroyer Division!
desc: Have Isonami, Uranami, Ayanami and Shikinami in your fleet.

name: 「第十六戦隊(第三次)」を編成せよ！
detail: 「鬼怒」「青葉」「北上」「大井」を擁する、第十六戦隊(第三次)を編成せよ！
title: Form the 16th Cruiser Division (Third Generation)!
desc: Have Kinu, Aoba, Kitakami and Ooi in your fleet.

name: 精鋭「第十六戦隊」を再編成せよ！
detail:
「鬼怒改二」を旗艦として、「北上改二」「大井改二」「球磨改」及び
「青葉改」「浦波改」「敷波改」から5隻、計6隻の精鋭「第十六戦隊」を再編成せよ！
title: Reform the Elite 16th Cruiser Division!
desc: Have Kinu Kai Ni as flagship and any five of Kitakami Kai Ni, Ooi Kai Ni, Kuma Kai, Aoba Kai, Uranami Kai and Shikinami Kai in your fleet.
memo: Rewards a Repair Team

name: 新編「第一戦隊」を編成せよ！
detail:
編成任務：第一艦隊に新改装された長門型戦艦一番艦「長門改二」及び同二番艦「陸奥改」からなる
新編第一戦隊を配備せよ！
title: Form the New 1st Battleship Division!
desc: Have Nagato Kai Ni as flagship and Mutsu Kai in Fleet 1.
memo: Rewards an Irako

name: 新編「第七戦隊」を編成せよ！
detail:
編成任務：第一艦隊旗艦に新改装された改鈴谷型「熊野改二」、同二番艦に「鈴谷改二」、
僚艦に「最上改」「三隈改」を配した新編第七戦隊を配備せよ！
title: Form the New 7th Cruiser Division!
desc: Have Kumano Kai Ni (or Kou) as flagship, Suzuya Kai Ni (or Kou) as second ship, Mogami Kai and Mikuma Kai in Fleet 1.
memo: Rewards an Irako

name: 精鋭「第四航空戦隊」を再編成せよ！
detail:
編成任務：第一艦隊旗艦及び同二番艦に練度50以上の航空戦艦「伊勢」「日向」を配備、
随伴艦に軽巡洋艦1隻、駆逐艦2隻他を伴う精鋭「第四航空戦隊」を再編成せよ！
title: Reform the Elite 4th Carrier Division!
desc: Have Lv.50+ Ise and Lv. 50+ Hyuuga as flagship and second ship, 1 CL, 2 DD, and 1 additional ship in Fleet 1.
memo: Rewards a Skilled Crew Member

name: 新編「第四水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！
detail:
編成任務：第一艦隊旗艦に「由良改二」を配備、随伴艦に二駆「村雨」「夕立」「春雨」「五月雨」
他1隻の駆逐艦を配備、新編「第四水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！
title: Form the New 4th Torpedo Squadron!
desc: Have Yura Kai Ni as flagship, Murasame, Yuudachi, Harusame, Samidare, and 1 other DD in Fleet 1.
memo: Rewards a Repair Team

name: 精鋭「第二二駆逐隊」を再編成せよ！
detail:
編成任務：「文月改二」「皐月改二」「水無月改」「長月改」の精強駆逐艦4隻の編成による
精鋭第二二駆逐隊を再編成せよ！
title: Reform the Elite 22nd Destroyer Division!
desc: Have Fumizuki Kai Ni, Satsuki Kai Ni, Minazuki Kai and Nagatsuki Kai in your fleet.
memo: Rewards 2 Combat Rations

name: 精強「任務部隊」を編成せよ！
detail:
編成任務：第一艦隊旗艦に「Saratoga Mk.II」または同「Mod.2」を配備、随伴艦に
軽巡洋艦1隻、駆逐艦2隻以上を配した夜間作戦可能な機動部隊を新編せよ！
title: Form the Powerful Task Force!
desc: Have Saratoga Mk.II or Mod.2 as flagship, 1 CL and 2 DD in Fleet 1.
memo:
Rewards:
First choice: Either a F6F-3 OR a F4U-1D
Second choice: Either a TBF OR a New Model Aviation Armament Materials

name: 最精鋭「第八駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
detail:
精鋭駆逐隊編成任務：「朝潮改二」「大潮改二」「荒潮改二」「満潮改二」の
最精鋭朝潮型駆逐艦4隻による新編「第八駆逐隊」の編成を完了せよ！
title: Form the Supreme 8th Destroyer Division!
desc: Have ONLY Arashio Kai Ni, Asashio Kai Ni (or D), Michishio Kai Ni, and Ooshio Kai Ni in your fleet.
memo: Rewards a Combat Ration and an Irako

name: 「西村艦隊」第二戦隊随伴部隊、集結せよ！
detail:
捷一号作戦準備任務：第一遊撃部隊第三部隊の中核となる第二戦隊の随伴艦を編成する。
各艦隊から艦艇を抽出、第三艦隊に「最上」「時雨」「満潮」「朝雲」「山雲」を配備せよ！
title: Nishimura Fleet, 2nd Division Escort Force, Assemble!
desc: Have Mogami, Asagumo, Michishio, Shigure and Yamagumo in Fleet 3.
memo: Rewards either 2 Irako OR a Furniture Fairy OR a New Model Artillery Armament Materials

name: 精鋭「三一駆」第一小隊、抜錨準備！
detail: 編成任務：「長波改二」旗艦、僚艦に「高波改」または「沖波改」「朝霜改」を配した、第三一駆逐隊第一小隊(2隻艦隊)を編成せよ！

choices.name: 戦闘糧食(特別なおにぎり)

title: Elite DesDiv 31, First Platoon, Prepare to Sortie!
desc: Have Naganami Kai Ni as flagship and ONLY ONE of Takanami Kai, Asashimo Kai or Okinami Kai in your fleet.
memo: Rewards either 2 Combat Ration (Special Onigiri) OR a Furniture Fairy

name: 精鋭「四水戦」抜錨準備！
detail:
四水戦(4Sd)特別編成：「村雨改二」旗艦と精鋭四水戦「由良改二」「夕立改二」「春雨改」「五月雨改」
「秋月改」より3隻、さらに主力艦2隻を配備した、有力な特務艦隊を編成、南方海域出撃に備えよ！
title: Elite DesRon 4, Prepare to Set Sail!
desc: Fill an entire six-ship fleet with Murasame Kai Ni as flagship, 3+ of Yura Kai Ni, Yuudachi Kai Ni, Harusame Kai, Samidare Kai or Akizuki Kai and your choice of other ships.
memo: Rewards a Repair Goddess

name: 精鋭「第二一駆逐隊」、抜錨準備！
detail:
精鋭駆逐隊編成任務：捷一号作戦を支援する。同決戦正面の基地航空への資材輸送任務のため、
「若葉改」「初春改二」「初霜改二」を含む3～4隻の精鋭「第二一駆逐隊」の編成を完了せよ！
title: Elite 21st Destroyer Division, Prepare to Set Sail!
desc: Have Wakaba Kai, Hatsuharu Kai Ni and Hatsushimo Kai Ni, up to 1 other DD, and no other ships in your fleet.
memo:
If Nenohi is in the fleet, additional audio dialogue will play after the quest is turned in. There may be other unknown requirements for this.
Rewards a Combat Ration

name: 改装「第十七駆逐隊」、再編始め！
detail:
改装駆逐隊編成任務：改装した陽炎型駆逐艦「浦風改」「谷風改」、そして対空戦闘の激化に備え、
対空兵装を軸に大幅強化改装した「磯風乙改」「浜風乙改」による「第十七駆逐隊」を再編せよ！
title: Remodeled 17th Destroyer Division, Commence Restructuring!
desc: Have ONLY Hamakaze B Kai, Isokaze B Kai, Urakaze Kai and Tanikaze Kai in your fleet.
memo: Rewards a Mamiya and a Reinforcement Expansion

name: 精鋭「第十八駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
detail: 精鋭駆逐隊編成任務：「霰改二」「霞改二/改二乙」「陽炎改」「不知火改」4隻による精鋭「第十八駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
title: Form the Elite 18th Destroyer Division!
desc: Have ONLY Arare Kai Ni, Kasumi Kai Ni (or B), Kagerou Kai and Shiranui Kai in your fleet.
memo: Rewards either a Reinforcement Expansion OR a Furniture Fairy

name: 最精鋭甲型駆逐艦、集結せよ！
detail: 甲型駆逐隊編成任務：「陽炎改二」「不知火改二」「黒潮改二」を集中配備、さらに練度70以上の甲型駆逐艦【陽炎型/夕雲型駆逐艦】を3隻集中配備、精鋭艦隊型駆逐隊を編成せよ！
title: Supreme Type-A Destroyers, Assemble!
desc: Have Kagerou Kai Ni, Shiranui Kai Ni, Kuroshio Kai Ni and three level 70+ Kagerou/Yuugumo-class DD in your fleet.
memo: Rewards either a 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai Ni OR a Medal

name: 精鋭「第十八戦隊」を再編成せよ！
detail: 旧式小型軽巡部隊の改装再編成：改天龍型軽巡「天龍改二」及び「龍田改二」の2隻で構成される精鋭「第十八戦隊」を再編成せよ！
title: Form the Elite 18th Cruiser Division!
desc: Have ONLY Tenryuu Kai Ni and Tatsuta Kai Ni in your fleet.
memo: Rewards either 5 Development Materials OR a Furniture Fairy

name: 敵艦隊を撃破せよ！
detail: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
title: Daily Victory
desc: Defeat an Abyssal fleet by obtaining at least a B-Rank.
memo: Crush the Enemy Fleet!

name: はじめての「出撃」！
detail: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊と交戦せよ！
title: Sortieing for the First Time!
desc: Sortie your main fleet.

name: 鎮守府正面海域を護れ！
detail: 鎮守府正面海域に艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦の跳梁を阻止せよ！
title: Guard the Sea in Front of the Naval Base!
desc: Sortie to [W1-1]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

name: 南西諸島沖に出撃せよ！
detail: 南西諸島沖に艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊と交戦せよ！
title: Sortie into the Nansei Islands Region!
desc: Sortie to [W1-2]. Reach the end of the map.

name: 接近する「敵前衛艦隊」を迎撃せよ！
detail: 南西諸島沖に接近する「敵前衛艦隊」を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
title: Intercept the Approaching Enemy Vanguard Fleet!
desc: Sortie to [W1-2]. B-Rank+ the boss node.
memo: Rewards the DD, Miyuki

name: 「水雷戦隊」で出撃せよ！
detail: 軽巡洋艦1隻を旗艦とし、複数の駆逐艦からなる水雷戦隊で出撃せよ！
title: Sortie a Torpedo Squadron!
desc: Sortie a CL as flagship and 3 DD to any map.
memo: Rewards the CL, Tatsuta

name: 「重巡洋艦」を出撃させよ！
detail: 重巡洋艦を旗艦とした艦隊を編成、これを出撃させよ！
title: Sortie a Heavy Cruiser!
desc: Sortie a CA as flagship to any map.

name: 「戦艦」を出撃させよ！
detail: 海上の覇者、戦艦を旗艦とした艦隊を編成、これを出撃させよ！
title: Sortie a Battleship!
desc: Sortie a BB flagship to any map. A BBV will not count.

name: 「空母機動部隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 空母1隻とその護衛艦艇で構成した空母機動部隊を出撃させよ！
title: Sortie a Carrier Task Force!
desc: Sortie a CV(L) flagship and 5 DD/CL/AV to any map.

name: 敵艦隊を10回邀撃せよ！
detail: 艦隊全力出撃！遊弋する敵艦隊を10回邀撃せよ！
title: Daily Battles
desc: Attack 10 Abyssal fleets.
memo: Assault 10 Enemy Fleets!

name: 敵空母を３隻撃沈せよ！
detail: 艦隊の脅威となる敵空母群。これを捕捉撃滅し、3隻轟沈せよ！
title: Daily Carriers
desc: Sink 3 Abyssal CV(L).
memo: Sink 3 Enemy Carriers!

name: 敵輸送船団を叩け！
detail: 敵の輸送船5隻以上を撃沈し、敵の補給路を寸断せよ！
title: Daily Transports 2
desc: Sink 5 Abyssal transport ships.
memo: Strike at the Enemy Transport Convoy!

name: 海上通商破壊作戦
detail: 1週間で敵輸送船を20隻以上撃沈せよ！
title: Weekly Transports
desc: Sink 20 Abyssal transport ships.
memo: Naval Commerce Raid Operation

name: あ号作戦
detail: 1週間の全力出撃を行い、可能な限り多くの敵艦隊を捕捉、これを迎撃せよ！
title: Weekly Sorties
desc: Sortie 36 times, reach 24 boss nodes, B-Rank+ 12 boss nodes, and obtain 6 S-Ranks.
memo: Operation A-Go

name: 第２艦隊、出撃せよ！
detail: 新たに編成した「第２艦隊」を出撃させよ！
title: Second Fleet, Sortie!
desc: Sortie your 2nd Fleet to any map. A sortie, not an expedition.

name: 敵艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
detail: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊「主力」を捕捉！これを撃滅せよ！
title: Daily Battle
desc: Attack 1 Abyssal fleet.
memo: Destroy the Enemy Fleet's Flagship!

name: 敵空母を撃沈せよ！
detail: 敵機動部隊を捕捉し、これを邀撃、敵空母を轟沈せよ！
title: Sink an Enemy Carrier!
desc: Sink an Abyssal CV(L).
memo: Rewards the CV, Akagi

name: 敵補給艦を3隻撃沈せよ！
detail: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵補給艦を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
title: Daily Transports
desc: Sink 3 Abyssal transport ships.
memo: Sink 3 Enemy Supply Ships!

name: 「三川艦隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 新編成した「三川艦隊」で出撃せよ！
title: Sortie the Mikawa Fleet!
desc: Sortie Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu and 1 additional FAST ship to any map.
memo: Rewards a Repair Team

name: い号作戦
detail: 有力な母艦航空隊で1週間の全力出撃を行い、可能な限り多くの敵空母を撃滅せよ！
title: Weekly Carriers
desc: Sink 20 Abyssal CV(L).
memo: Operation I-Go

name: ろ号作戦
detail: 1週間の全力出撃を行い、敵輸送船団を捕捉・撃滅、敵の補給路を寸断せよ！
title: Weekly Transports 2
desc: Sink 50 Abyssal transport ships.
memo: Operation Ro-Go

name: 「第六駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 「暁」「響」「雷」「電」による第六駆逐隊、出撃せよ！
title: Sortie the 6th Destroyer Division!
desc: Sortie ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Inazuma and Ikazuchi to any map.

name: 「第四戦隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 「愛宕」「高雄」「鳥海」「摩耶」を基幹とする第四戦隊で、バシー島沖の敵を撃滅せよ！
title: Sortie the 4th Cruiser Division!
desc: Sortie Atago, Takao, Choukai, Maya and 2 additional ships to [W2-2]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

name: 「西村艦隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 「扶桑」「山城」「最上」「時雨」を基幹とする西村艦隊で、オリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
title: Sortie the Nishimura Fleet!
desc: Sortie Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure and 2 additional ships to [W2-3]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

name: 「第五航空戦隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 「翔鶴」「瑞鶴」を基幹とする第五航空戦隊で、北方海域モーレイ海の敵を撃滅せよ！
title: Sortie the 5th Carrier Division!
desc: Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku and 4 additional ships to [W3-1]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

name: 南西諸島海域の制海権を握れ！
detail: 艦隊を南西諸島海域に全力出撃させ、多数の敵艦隊「主力」群を捕捉、撃滅せよ！
title: Daily [W2] Bosses
desc: Sortie to any map in [W2]. B-Rank+ any boss node 5 times.
memo: Seize Control of the Nansei Islands Region!

name: 新「三川艦隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 完全編成した「三川艦隊」をもって、オリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
title: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet!
desc: Sortie Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka and Tenryuu to [W2-3]. B-Rank+ the boss node.
memo: Rewards a Repair Team

name: 海上護衛戦
detail: 有力な対潜能力を持つ海上護衛隊によって、可能な限り多くの敵潜水艦を撃滅せよ！
title: Weekly Submarines
desc: Sink 15 Abyssal submarines.
memo:
Naval Escort Battle
Rewards a Screw

name: 敵東方艦隊を撃滅せよ！
detail: 西方海域に出撃し、敵東方艦隊の主力を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
title: Weekly [W4] Bosses
desc: Sortie to any map in [W4]. B-Rank+ any boss node 12 times.
memo: Destroy the Enemy's Eastern Fleet!

name: 敵潜水艦を制圧せよ！
detail: 対潜能力の充実した艦隊で出撃、敵潜水艦狩りを実施せよ！
title: Daily Submarines
desc: Sink 6 Abyssal submarines.
memo: Enemy Submarine Suppression!

name: 「潜水艦隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 伊号潜水艦2隻からなる潜水艦隊でオリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
title: Sortie a Submarine Fleet!
desc: Sortie 2 SS and 4 additional ships to [W2-3]. B-Rank+ the boss node.
memo: Rewards a Furniture Fairy

name: 「航空水上打撃艦隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 航空戦艦2隻と航空巡洋艦2隻を基幹とする艦隊でカレー洋の制海権を握れ！
title: Sortie an Aviation Surface Attack Fleet!
desc: Sortie 2 BBV, 2 CAV and 2 additional ships to [W4-2]. B-Rank+ the boss node.
memo: Rewards a Mamiya

name: 「第六戦隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 編成した「第六戦隊」をもって出撃し、オリョール海の敵を撃滅「完全勝利」せよ！
title: Sortie the 6th Cruiser Division!
desc: Sortie Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa, Aoba and 2 additional ships to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node.
memo: Rewards a Repair Team

name: 「第八駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 編成した「第八駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、オリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
title: Sortie the 8th Destroyer Division!
desc: Sortie Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio, Arashio and 2 additional ships to [W2-3]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

name: 「第十八駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 編成した「第十八駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、北方海域モーレイ海の敵を撃滅せよ！
title: Sortie the 18th Destroyer Division!
desc: Sortie Kasumi, Arare, Kagerou, Shiranui and 2 additional ships to [W3-1]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

name: 敵北方艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
detail: 北方海域の深部に出撃し、敵北方艦隊の主力艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
title: Weekly [W3] Bosses
desc: Sortie to [W3-3], [W3-4] or [W3-5]. B-Rank+ any boss node 5 times.
memo:
Destroy the Enemy Fleet's Main Forces to the North!
Rewards 3 Screws

name: 敵東方中枢艦隊を撃破せよ！
detail: 西方海域カスガダマ島沖に出撃し、敵東方中枢艦隊を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！

name: 精鋭艦隊演習
detail: 同日中に「演習」で7回以上「勝利」をおさめ、我が精鋭艦隊の練度を示そう！
title: Monthly Exercises 1
desc: Secure 7 victories in Exercises within the same day.
memo: Elite Fleet Exercises

name: 上陸部隊演習
detail: 島嶼攻略部隊の練度向上のため、本日中に演習で4回以上「勝利」せよ！
title: Landing Force Exercises
desc: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day.

name: 秋季大演習
detail: 秋の一日中に「演習」で8回以上「勝利」をおさめ、艦隊のさらなる練度に努めよ！
title: Mass Exercises for Fall
desc: Secure 8 victories in Exercises within the same day.
memo: Rewards a Mamiya and a Present Box

name: 冬季大演習
detail: 冬の一日中に「演習」で8回以上「勝利」をおさめ、艦隊のさらなる練度に努めよ！
title: Mass Exercises for Winter
desc: Secure 8 victories in Exercises within the same day.
memo: Rewards a Mamiya

name: 春季大演習
detail: 春季大演習：春の一日中に「演習」で8回以上「勝利」をおさめ、艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
title: Mass Exercises for Spring
desc: Secure 8 victories in Exercises within the same day.
memo: Rewards a Mamiya and a Present Box

name: 輸送部隊の練度向上に努めよ！
detail: 演習任務：輸送部隊の練度向上を図る！本日中に演習で4回以上「勝利」せよ！
title: Strive to Improve the Transport Force's Level of Training!
desc: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day.
memo: Rewards 2 Screws and either a Furniture Fairy OR a Daihatsu Landing Craft.

name: 甲型駆逐艦の戦力整備計画
detail:
甲型駆逐艦整備任務：甲型駆逐艦【夕雲型/陽炎型】を2隻以上配備した第一艦隊で演習で3回「勝利」、
その後、同艦隊を南西諸島海域に投入。各出撃で得られた戦訓を艦隊型駆逐艦戦力整備に活用せよ！
title: A Project to Facilitate the Combat Readiness of the Type-A Destroyers
desc: Secure 3 S-Ranks in Exercises using 2+ Kagerou-class or Yuugumo-class DDs. Then, sortie to [W2-2], [W2-3], [W2-4] and [W2-5]. A-Rank+ the bosses.
memo:
Use the above Destroyer classes for the [W2] sorties as well.
You can use up to 4 other ships for this quest.
You must use fleet 1.
Rewards:
First choice: Either an Action Report OR a Furniture Fairy
Second choice: Either 5 Buckets OR 2 Combat Rations

name: 給糧艦「伊良湖」の支援
detail:
伊良湖支援任務：軽巡を2隻以上配備した第一艦隊で本日中に演習で3回「勝利」、その後、
第一艦隊旗艦に戦闘糧食を二つ装備せよ！　※任務達成後、同戦闘糧食は消費します
title: Monthly Exercises 2
desc: Secure 3 victories in Exercises using at least 2 CLs in Fleet 1. Afterwards, equip secretary with 2 Combat Rations.
memo:
You must use fleet 1.
Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipment is unlocked!
The Supply Ship Irako's Support
Rewards an Irako and either 2 Buckets OR 2 Development Materials

name: 精鋭「第二一駆」、猛特訓！
detail:
駆逐隊演習任務：精鋭「第二一駆逐隊」3隻を含む艦隊を編成。作戦に先立ち、猛特訓を開始する！
同艦隊で、本日中に演習で4回勝利せよ！
title: Elite 21st Destroyer Division, Train Intensively!
desc: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day using Hatsuharu Kai Ni, Wakaba Kai, Hatsushimo Kai Ni and up to 3 other ships.
memo: Rewards a Mamiya and either 6 Development Materials OR an Action Report

name: 駆逐隊、特訓始め！
detail: 駆逐隊演習任務：駆逐艦4隻で編成される駆逐隊。この駆逐隊を含む艦隊を編成。特訓を開始する！同艦隊で本日中に演習にて4回以上勝利せよ！
title: Destroyer Division, Commence Intensive Training!
desc: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day using 4 DD and up to 2 additional ships.
memo: Rewards either 2 Screws OR 4 Development Materials

name: 海防艦、演習始め！
detail: 海防艦演習任務：海防艦を旗艦に配備し、随伴艦に駆逐艦2隻以上を配した演習艦隊を編成。本演習艦隊で、本日中に演習で2回以上勝利せよ！
title: Kaiboukan, Commence Exercises!
desc: Secure 2 victories in Exercises within the same day using a DE flagship, 2 DD and up to 3 additional ships.
memo: Rewards furniture and either a Reinforcement Expansion OR a Medal

name: 最精鋭甲型駆逐艦、特訓始め！
detail: 甲型駆逐隊演習任務：練度70以上の甲型駆逐艦【陽炎型/夕雲型】駆逐艦4隻で編成される駆逐隊。この精鋭駆逐隊を含む艦隊を編成。演習を開始する！同艦隊で本日中に演習にて4回以上勝利せよ！
title: Supreme Type-A Destroyers, Commence Intensive Training!
desc: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day using 4 Lv70+ Kagerou/Yuugumo-class DD and up to 2 additional ships.
memo:
Rewards:
First choice: Either four Development Materials OR four Buckets
Second choice: Either a Medal OR an Action Report

name: 戦闘航空母艦一番艦、演習始め！
detail: 改装航空戦艦(戦闘航空母艦)演習任務：旗艦「伊勢改二」、随伴艦に駆逐艦2隻以上を配した航空戦隊を編成。新改装艦の慣熟も兼ねた同航空戦隊の演習で、本日中に3回以上勝利せよ！
title: Battle Carrier Lead Ship, Commence Exercises!
desc: Secure 3 victories in Exercises within the same day using Ise Kai Ni as flagship, 2 DD and up to 3 additional ships.
memo:
Rewards:
First choice: Either two Suisei OR two Zuiun OR a Type 2 Reconnaissance Aircraft
Second choice: Either two Type 22 Surface Radars OR two 12cm 30-tube Rocket Launchers OR a New Model Artillery Armament Materials

name: 改夕雲型、演習始め！
detail: 改夕雲型演習任務：改夕雲型駆逐艦「夕雲改二」「長波改二」の精鋭駆逐艦2隻を含む艦隊を編成。改夕雲型駆逐隊の慣熟演習を開始する！同艦隊で本日中に演習にて4回以上勝利せよ！
title: Remodelled Yuugumo-class, Commence Exercises!
desc: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day using Yuugumo Kai Ni, Naganami Kai Ni and up to 4 additional ships.
memo:
Rewards:
First choice: Either three Irako OR two Type 2 Depth Charges
Second choice: Either a Reinforcement Expansion OR a Medal

name: はじめての「遠征」！
detail: 艦隊を「遠征」に出発させよう！
title: The First Expedition!
desc: Attempt an expedition.

name: 「遠征」を３回成功させよう！
detail: 本日中に「遠征」３回成功させよう！
title: Daily Expeditions 1
desc: Complete 3 successful expeditions within the same day.
memo: Complete 3 Successful Expeditions!

name: 「遠征」を１０回成功させよう！
detail: 本日中に「遠征」10回成功させよう！
title: Daily Expeditions 2
desc: Complete 10 successful expeditions within the same day.
memo: Complete 10 Successful Expeditions!

name: 大規模遠征作戦、発令！
detail: 今週中に「遠征」30回成功させよう！
title: Weekly Expeditions
desc: Complete 30 successful expeditions within the same week.
memo: The Declaration of Large-Scale Expedition Operations!

name: 第一次潜水艦派遣作戦
detail: はじめての潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させよう！
title: The First Submarine Dispatch Operation!
desc: Complete Expedition 30.
memo: Rewards a Repair Team

name: 第二次潜水艦派遣作戦
detail: 第二次潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させよう！
title: The Second Submarine Dispatch Operation!
desc: Complete Expedition 30 one more time.
memo: Rewards a Ju 87C Kai

name: 潜水艦派遣作戦による技術入手の継続！
detail: 第三次及び第四次潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させ、他国製技術の導入に努めよ！
title: Operation to Acquire Foreign Technology!
desc: Complete Expedition 30 two more times.
memo:
Operation to Acquire Technology via Continued Submarine Dispatch Operations!
Rewards a Ju 87C Kai and a Furniture Fairy

name: 潜水艦派遣による海外艦との接触作戦
detail: 有力な潜水艦隊派遣による海外艦との接触作戦を成功させよ！
title: Operation to Contact a Foreign Ship!
desc: Complete Expedition 31.
memo:
Operation to Contact a Foreign Ship via Continued Submarine Dispatches
Rewards the DD, Z1; enables Z3 and Bismarck construction

name: 南方への輸送作戦を成功させよ！
detail: 激戦海域である南方海域への「東京急行」系遠征を敢行、これを成功させよ！
title: Weekly Tokyo Express
desc: Complete Expedition 37 or 38.
memo: Succeed at a Southern Transport Operation!

name: 南方への鼠輸送を継続実施せよ！
detail: 今週中に「東京急行」系遠征を継続的に実施、同種作戦を7回成功させよう！
title: Weekly Tokyo Express 2
desc: Complete Expedition 37 or 38 six more times within the same week.
memo:
Continue to Carry Out Southern Tokyo Express Operations!
Rewards a Screw

name: 航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！
detail: 「航空戦艦運用演習」を実施し、航空火力艦の運用の強化に努めよ！
title: Enhance the Effectiveness of Aviation Firepower!
desc: Complete Expedition 23.
memo: Rewards a Zuiun (634 Air Group)

name: (続)航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！
detail: 「航空戦艦運用演習」を継続実施し、航空火力艦の運用の強化に引き続き努めよ！
title: Enhance the Effectiveness of Aviation Firepower! (Cont.)
desc: Complete Expedition 23 three more times.
memo: Rewards a Zuiun (634 Air Group)

name: 遠洋潜水艦作戦を実施せよ！
detail: 「遠洋潜水艦作戦」を実施し、潜水艦隊の練度向上と敵艦隊漸減に努めよ！

desc: Complete Expedition 39.
memo: Rewards a 53cm Submarine Bow Torpedo Mount (8 tubes)

name: 遠洋潜水艦作戦の成果を拡大せよ！
detail: 「遠洋潜水艦作戦」を継続実施し、潜水艦隊の練度向上と敵艦隊漸減に努めよ！
title: Extend the Benefits of the Deep Sea Submarine Operation!
desc: Complete Expedition 39 two more times.
memo: Rewards a 53cm Submarine Bow Torpedo Mount (8 tubes)

name: 防空射撃演習を実施せよ！
detail: 「防空射撃演習」を複数回実施し、艦隊の防空能力を高めよ！
title: Carry Out Anti-Air Accuracy Exercises!
desc: Complete Expedition 6 three times.
memo: Rewards a 25mm Triple Autocannon Mount

name: 囮機動部隊支援作戦を実施せよ！
detail: 「囮機動部隊支援作戦」を実施し、これを成功させよ！
title: Carry Out the Decoy Task Force Support Operation!
desc: Complete Expedition 15.
memo: Rewards a Type 91 Anti-Aircraft Fire Director

name: 観艦式予行を実施せよ！
detail: 観艦式を実施する。予行として「観艦式予行」を複数回実施し、これを2回成功させよ！
title: Carry Out Naval Review Rehearsals!
desc: Complete Expedition 7 twice.

name: 観艦式を敢行せよ！
detail: 練度の高い艦隊で観艦式本番を実施する。「観艦式」を実施し、これを成功させよ！
title: Execute the Naval Review!
desc: Complete Expedition 8.
memo: Rewards a Screw and a Headquarters Personnel

name: 機動部隊の運用を強化せよ！
detail: 機動部隊遠征を実施、「MO作戦」及び「敵母港空襲作戦」を展開、これを成功させよ！
title: Enhance the Effectiveness of the Task Force!
desc: Complete Expeditions 35 and 26.
memo: Rewards 2 Screws

name: 潜水艦派遣作戦による航空機技術入手
detail: 潜水艦派遣作戦により、新型航空機技術の導入に努めよ！
title: Submarine Dispatch Operation to Acquire Aircraft Technology
desc: Complete Expeditions 30 and 31.
memo: Rewards a New Model Aircraft Blueprint

name: 潜水艦派遣作戦による噴式技術の入手
detail:
鉄鋼5,000及びボーキサイト1,500を準備して、潜水艦派遣作戦により
噴式エンジン技術の導入に努めよ！※任務達成後、準備した資源は消費します。
title: Submarine Dispatch Operation to Acquire Jet Engine Technology
desc: Have 5000 steel and 1500 bauxite. Complete Expeditions 30 and 31.
memo:
Consumes the resources.
Rewards a Ne-Type Engine

name: 輸送船団護衛を強化せよ！
detail: 遠征任務：「海上護衛任務」を反復実施し、輸送船団の護衛に務めよ！
title: Monthly Expedition 5
desc: Complete Expedition 5 four times.
memo: Intensify the Transport Fleet Escort!

name: 海上護衛総隊、遠征開始！
detail:
遠征任務：遠征任務「対潜警戒任務」「海上護衛任務」「タンカー護衛任務」を実施、
軽巡、駆逐艦、海防艦などから編成された護衛艦隊で各遠征を成功させよ！
title: Naval Escort Fleet, Commence With the Expeditions!
desc: Complete Expeditions 4, 5 and 9.

name: 海上通商航路の警戒を厳とせよ！
detail:
遠征任務：遠征任務「警備任務」「対潜警戒任務」「海上護衛任務」「強行偵察任務」
を実施し、敵の通商破壊部隊を制圧、海上通商航路の安全を確保せよ！
title: Quarterly Expeditions
desc: Complete Expeditions 3, 4, 5 and 10.
memo:
Perform Strict Vigilance Over the Maritime Trade Routes!
Rewards 2 Combat Rations

name: 遠征「補給」支援体制を強化せよ！
detail:
遠征補給支援体制の強化：鋼材800を用意し、遠征任務「兵站強化任務」を実施。
同遠征任務を成功させ、艦隊遠征時における「補給」支援体制の拡充に努めよ！
title: Strengthen the Expeditionary Resupply Logistics!
desc: Have 800 Steel. Complete Expedition A1.
memo:
Unlocks Provisional Resupply for Expeditions. This enables resupplying expeditions from the expedition page.
Rewards 2 Combat Rations

name: 近海に侵入する敵潜を制圧せよ！
detail:
敵潜制圧任務：遠征任務「対潜警戒任務」「海峡警備行動」「長時間対潜警戒」を
それぞれ複数回実施し、近海に潜り込む敵潜部隊を制圧、我が領海から叩き出せ！
title: Quarterly Expeditions 2
desc: Complete Expeditions 4, A2 and A3. Clear each of them twice.
memo:
Suppress the Enemy Submarine Incursions into Coastal Waters!
Rewards 3 Screws and a Type 95 Depth Charge

name: 「捷一号作戦」、発動準備！
detail:
捷一号作戦準備任務：遠征任務「警備任務」「兵站強化任務」及び「南西方面航空偵察作戦」
を実施。これを無事完遂し、南西方面での作戦準備にあたれ！
title: Operation Sho-Ichi-Go: Begin Preparations!
desc: Complete Expeditions 3, A1 and B1.
memo: Rewards 2 Underway Replenishments

name: 「海防艦」、進発せよ
detail: 海上護衛任務：遠征任務「兵站強化任務」「海峡警備行動」「海上護衛任務」「タンカー護衛任務」を海防艦、駆逐艦などを主軸とした護衛艦隊で実施せよ！
title: Kaiboukan, Advance!
desc: Complete Expeditions 5, 9, A1 and A2.
memo: Rewards an Irako and either two Underway Replenishments OR 8 Buckets OR 4 Screws

name: はじめての「補給」！
detail: 補給は大事です！燃料・弾薬を艦に「補給」しよう！
title: Resupply for the First Time!
desc: Resupply a ship.

name: はじめての「入渠」！
detail: 戦闘で傷ついた艦を「入渠」させて修理して、次の出撃に備えよう！
title: Docking for the First Time!
desc: Repair a ship.

name: 艦隊大整備！
detail: 各艦隊から整備が必要な艦を5隻以上ドック入りさせ、大規模な整備をしよう！
title: Daily Repairs
desc: Repair 5 ships.
memo: Mass Fleet Servicing!

name: 艦隊酒保祭り！
detail: 艦隊酒保祭り！各艦に延べ15回以上の補給を実施しよう！
title: Daily Resupplies
desc: Resupply your ships 15 times.
memo: The Fleet Mess Hall Feast!

name: はじめての「建造」！
detail: 「工廠」で鋼材などの資材を使って新しい艦を「建造」しよう！
title: The First Construction!
desc: Construct a ship.

name: はじめての「開発」！
detail: 「工廠」でボーキサイトなどの資材を使って新しい装備アイテムを「開発」しよう！
title: The First Development!
desc: Construct a piece of equipment.

name: はじめての「解体」！
detail: 「工廠」で不要な艦を「解体」してみよう！
title: The First Dismantlement!
desc: Scrap a ship.

name: はじめての「廃棄」！
detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを「廃棄」してみよう！
title: The First Disposal!
desc: Scrap a piece of equipment.

name: 新装備「開発」指令
detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを新たに「開発」しよう(失敗もOK)！
title: Daily Development 1
desc: Attempt to construct a piece of equipment. Failures count toward this.
memo: Orders to Develop New Equipment

name: 新造艦「建造」指令
detail: 「工廠」で艦娘を本日中に新たに「建造」しよう！
title: Daily Construction 1
desc: Construct a ship.
memo: Orders to Construct a New Ship

name: 装備「開発」集中強化！
detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを本日中に3回「開発」しよう(失敗もOK)！
title: Daily Development 2
desc: Attempt to construct 3 pieces of equipment. Failures count toward this.
memo: Concentrated Enhanced Equipment Development

name: 艦娘「建造」艦隊強化！
detail: 艦隊強化のため、「工廠」で艦娘を本日中に3隻「建造」しよう！
title: Daily Construction 2
desc: Construct 3 ships.
memo: Enhance the Fleet by Constructing Ship Girls!

name: 軍縮条約対応！
detail: 少し艦隊規模が大きくなりすぎました！「工廠」で不要な艦を2隻「解体」してください！
title: Daily Dismantlement
desc: Scrap 2 ships.
memo: In Correspondence With the Disarmament Treaty!

name: 「大型艦建造」の準備！(その弐)

title: Preparation for Large Ship Construction! (Part 2)
desc: Scrap 4 pieces of equipment.
memo: Enables Large Ship Construction

name: 式の準備！(その壱)
detail: 式の準備をします！「工廠」で装備アイテムを2回「廃棄」して身の回りの整理を！
title: Preparation for the Ceremony! (Part 1)
desc: Scrap 2 pieces of equipment to show your love!

name: 輸送用ドラム缶の準備
detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを3回「廃棄」して、輸送用のドラム缶を準備します。
title: Prepare the Transport Drums!
desc: Scrap 3 pieces of equipment.
memo: Rewards 3 Drum Canisters

name: 資源の再利用

title: Weekly Dismantlement
desc: Scrap 24 pieces of equipment. Scrap them one at a time.
memo:
Recycling of Assets
Rewards a Drum Canister

name: 機種転換
detail: 「九七式艦攻(友永隊)」搭載空母を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「天山」を2つ廃棄！
title: Model Conversion: Tomonaga
desc: Set a CV(B/L) as secretary. Equip her with a Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron). Scrap two Tenzan.
memo:
Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
Rewards a Tenzan Model 12 (Tomonaga Squadron)

name: 機種転換
detail: 「九九式艦爆(江草隊)」搭載空母を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「彗星」を2つ廃棄！
title: Model Conversion: Egusa
desc: Set a CV(B/L) as secretary. Equip her with a Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron). Scrap two Suisei.
memo:
Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
Rewards a Suisei (Egusa Squadron)

name: 機種転換
detail: 「零戦52型丙(六〇一空)」搭載空母を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「烈風」を2つ廃棄！
title: Model Conversion: 601 Air Group
desc: Set a CV(B/L) as secretary. Equip her with a Zero Fighter Type 52 Type C (601 Air Group). Scrap two Reppuu.
memo:
Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!

desc: Sortie to [W2-2] and [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss nodes of both maps.
memo: Rewards furniture

name: 新編艦隊、南西諸島防衛線へ急行せよ！
detail: 水雷戦隊を含む新編艦隊を南西諸島防衛線に展開、同方面に来襲する敵艦隊を撃破せよ！
title: New Fleet, Hurry to the Nansei Islands Defense Line!
desc: Sortie a CL/CLT/CT flagship, 4 DD, and up to 1 additional ship to [W1-4]. A-Rank+ the boss node.
memo: Rewards a Mamiya

name: 鎮守府近海航路の安全確保を強化せよ！
detail: 水雷戦隊を含む新編艦隊を鎮守府近海航路に出撃させ、同航路の安全確保に努めよ！
title: Solidify and Maintain the Safety of the Base's Local Routes!
desc: Sortie a CL flagship, 4 DD and up to 1 additional ship to [W1-6]. Reach node N.
memo: Rewards a Furniture Fairy

name: 「第三十一戦隊」敵潜を制圧せよ！
detail: 第三十一戦隊(第一次)を鎮守府近海航路に再投入！反復出撃し、敵潜を制圧せよ！
title: The 31st Cruiser Division's Anti-Submarine Suppression!
desc: Sortie Isuzu Kai Ni as flagship, Satsuki Kai Ni, Uzuki Kai and 3 additional ships to [W1-6]. Reach node N twice.
memo: Rewards 2 Screws and a Type 3 Active Sonar

name: 新編「第八駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
detail: 新編「第八駆逐隊」を含む艦隊を鎮守府近海航路に出撃させ、同航路の安全確保に努めよ！
title: Sortie the New 8th Destroyer Division!
desc: Sortie Asashio Kai Ni+ as flagship, Michishio, Ooshio, Arashio and 2 additional ships to [W1-6]. Reach node N.
memo: Rewards a Searchlight and a Daihatsu Landing Craft

name: 精鋭「八駆第一小隊」対潜哨戒！
detail: 「第八駆逐隊第一小隊」を含む艦隊で鎮守府正面対潜哨戒を反復実施！敵潜を圧倒せよ！
title: The Elite 8th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol!
desc: Sortie a fleet that includes Asashio Kai Ni D and Ooshio Kai Ni to [W1-5]. S-Rank the boss node 2 times.
memo: Rewards 4 Screws and a Type 4 Passive Sonar

name: 沖ノ島海域迎撃戦
detail: 有力な艦隊を沖ノ島海域前面に反復投入、侵攻する敵機動部隊を迎撃、これを撃滅せよ！
title: Quarterly [W2-4]
desc: Sortie to [W2-4]. S-Rank the boss node 2 times.
memo:
Okinoshima Region Counterattack Op
Rewards a Mamiya and 5 Screws

name: 水雷戦隊、南西防衛線に反復出撃せよ！
detail:
軽巡級旗艦と駆逐艦4隻の水雷戦隊を基幹とした艦隊を編成、
南西諸島防衛線に反復出撃し、同海域の制海権確保に努めよ！
title: Torpedo Squadron, Persist on the Southwest Defense Line!
desc: Sortie a CL/CLT/CT as flagship, 4 DD and 1 additional ship to [W1-4]. A-Rank the boss node 2 times.
memo:
Torpedo Squadron, Repeatedly Sortie to the Southwestern Defense Line!
Rewards an Irako

name: 製油所地帯沿岸の哨戒を実施せよ！
detail:
軽空母旗艦と駆逐艦3隻を基幹とした護衛艦隊を編成、
製油所地帯沿岸に展開し、同海域の哨戒を実施、同海域の安全を確保せよ！
title: Carry Out a Patrol of the Coastal Refinery Area!
desc: Sortie a CVL as flagship, 3 DD and 2 additional ships to [W1-3]. S-Rank the boss node.
memo: Rewards a Furniture Fairy

name: 水雷戦隊、南西諸島海域を哨戒せよ！
detail:
水雷戦隊を基幹とした有力な艦隊で南西諸島海域バシー島沖及び東部オリョール海を哨戒、
同海域に遊弋する敵艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
title: Torpedo Squadron, Patrol the Nansei Islands Region!
desc: Sortie a CL/CLT/CT as flagship, 4 DD and 1 additional ship to [W2-2] and [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss nodes of both maps.
memo: Rewards an Irako and a Furniture Fairy

name: 「第十九駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
detail:
特型駆逐艦4隻による「第十九駆逐隊」を鎮守府近海に展開！
鎮守府正面対潜哨戒を実施し、跳梁する敵潜部隊の制圧に努めよ！
title: Sortie the 19th Destroyer Division!
desc: Sortie Isonami, Uranami, Ayanami and Shikinami to [W1-5]. A-Rank+ the boss node.
memo: Rewards an Irako

name: 「第十九駆逐隊」敵主力に突入せよ！
detail:
「第十九駆逐隊」を含む有力な艦隊を編成し、南西諸島海域沖ノ島沖に展開！
同方面に遊弋する敵主力を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！
title: Rush DesDiv 19 to Engage the Enemy's Main Forces!
desc: Sortie Isonami, Uranami, Ayanami and Shikinami and up to 2 additional ships to [W2-5]. A-Rank+ the boss node.
memo: Rewards 4 Screws and an Underway Replenishment

name: 飛行場設営の準備を実施せよ！
detail:
中部海域における航空偵察「K作戦」を再度実施、さらに同方面に遊弋する敵艦隊を撃滅し、
中部海域における飛行場設営の準備を実施せよ！
title: Carry Out Preparations for the Airfield Construction!
desc: Sortie to [W6-3]. S-Rank the boss node.
memo: Rewards a Construction Battalion

name: 夜間突入！敵上陸部隊を叩け！
detail: 南方サブ島沖海域へ精鋭艦隊を突入！敵艦隊の邀撃を突破し、同方面の敵上陸部隊を叩け！
title: Rush into the Night! Strike at the Enemy Landing Force!
desc: Sortie to [W5-3]. A-Rank+ the boss node.
memo: Rewards a Construction Battalion

name: 夜の海を照らす「灯り」を入手せよ！
detail:
有力な艦隊をカムラン半島に投入、同方面に出没する敵艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
そして、夜を照らす「灯り」を入手せよ！　ある季節は夜戦以外にも使い道があるようだ！
title: Acquire the Light that Illuminates the Night Sea!
desc: Sortie to [W2-1]. S-Rank the boss node.
memo: Rewards a Searchlight

name: 南西諸島防衛線を増強せよ！
detail:
水上機母艦または航空巡洋艦を旗艦とする有力な艦隊を南西諸島防衛線に投入、
水上機戦力によって同防衛線を強化、同方面の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
title: Reinforce the Nansei Islands Defense Line!
desc: Sortie an AV or CAV as flagship to [W1-4]. S-Rank the boss node.
memo: Rewards a Furniture Fairy

name: 「第十六戦隊(第三次)」出撃せよ！
detail: 「第十六戦隊(第三次)」を沖ノ島海域前面に展開、敵主力艦隊を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！
title: Sortie the 16th Cruiser Division (Third Generation)!
desc: Sortie Kinu, Aoba, Kitakami, Ooi and up to 2 additional ships to [W2-4]. A-Rank+ the boss node.
memo: Rewards an Irako and furniture

name: 精鋭「第十六戦隊」突入せよ！
detail:
再編成を完了した精鋭「第十六戦隊」を南西諸島海域沖ノ島沖に展開、
同方面に遊弋する敵主力を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！
title: Break Through With the Elite 16th Cruiser Division!
desc: Sortie Kinu Kai Ni as flagship and any five of Kitakami Kai Ni, Ooi Kai Ni, Kuma Kai, Aoba Kai, Uranami Kai and Shikinami Kai to [W2-5]. S-Rank the boss node.
memo: Rewards a Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft

name: 輸送作戦を成功させ、帰還せよ！
detail:
「鬼怒改二」を旗艦、僚艦に「浦波改」他駆逐艦3隻の計5隻の艦隊で
バシー島沖における柳輸送作戦を実施、同輸送作戦を完全成功させ、帰還せよ！
title: Succeed in the Transport Operation and Return!
desc: Sortie Kinu Kai Ni as flagship, Uranami Kai, 3 DD and one additional non-DD to [W2-2]. S-Rank the boss node.
memo: Rewards 5 Screws and an Underway Replenishment

name: 重巡戦隊、抜錨せよ！
detail:
重巡4隻を基幹戦力とした重巡旗艦の艦隊を南西諸島海域東部オリョール海に展開し、
同海域の敵艦隊を撃滅、制海権を確保せよ！

reward_other.name: 手編みとフローリング

title: Heavy Cruiser Division, Set Sail!
desc: Sortie a CA(V) as flagship, 3 other CA(V) and up to 2 additional ships to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node.
memo: Rewards an Irako and furniture

name: 戦艦戦隊、出撃せよ！
detail:
戦艦2隻を中核戦力とする戦艦旗艦の艦隊を北方海域アルフォンシーノ方面に進出させ、
同海域の敵艦隊を撃滅、北方海域の制海権確保に努めよ！
title: Sortie a Battleship Division!
desc: Sortie a (F)BB(V) as flagship, 1 other (F)BB(V) and up to 4 additional ships to [W3-3]. S-Rank the boss node. You will have to select a reward.
memo: Rewards 2 Screws and either a Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai OR a PBY-5A Catalina

name: 主力戦艦戦隊、抜錨せよ！
detail:
戦艦または航空戦艦2隻以上からなる強力な戦艦戦隊を中核とした艦隊を沖ノ島海域前面に展開、
侵攻する敵艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！

choices.name: 改良型艦本式タービン

title: Main Battleship Division, Set Sail!
desc: Sortie 2 BB(V) (not FBB) and up to 4 additional ships to [W2-4]. S-Rank the boss node. You will have to select a reward.
memo: Rewards an Irako and either an Improved Kanhon Type Turbine OR an Enhanced Kanhon Type Boiler

name: 精鋭「第八駆逐隊」突入せよ！
detail:
「荒潮改二」を旗艦とし、僚艦に「第八駆逐隊」から1隻を配備した精鋭第1艦隊で
サーモン海域北方に突入、同方面に接近する有力な敵艦隊を捕捉、同方面の敵戦力の漸減に努めよ！
title: Break Through With the Elite 8th Destroyer Division!
desc: Sortie Arashio Kai Ni as Fleet 1 flagship, one of Asashio, Ooshio, or Michishio, and 4 additional ships to [W5-5]. A-Rank+ the boss node 2 times.
memo: Rewards 4 Screws and a Reinforcement Expansion

name: 潜水艦隊、中部海域の哨戒を実施せよ！
detail:
潜水艦を旗艦とし、4隻以上の有力な潜水艦を配備した第一艦隊、精鋭潜水艦隊で
中部海域哨戒線に進出、回航中の敵空母を捕捉、これを襲撃せよ！
title: Submarine Fleet, Execute Patrols in the Central Waters!
desc: Sortie an SS(V) as flagship, 3 other SS(V), and two additional ships to [W6-1]. B-Rank+ the boss node.
memo: Rewards 3 Screws and an Irako

name: 春の準備任務：桃の節句準備を完遂せよ！
detail:
春の準備任務：艦隊を東部オリョール海に反復出撃、同方面敵艦隊を覆滅し、
同海域周辺の制海権を完全に確保、桃の節句を迎える準備を完遂せよ！
title: Spring Preparatory Mission: Carry out Preparations for Hinamatsuri!
desc: Sortie to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node 5 times.
memo: Rewards 3 Hishimochi and a Reinforcement Expansion

name: 重装甲巡洋艦、鉄底海峡に突入せよ！
detail: 第一艦隊旗艦に「Zara due」を配備、同艦隊で南方サブ島沖海域へ突入！同方面の敵艦隊群を突破し、鉄底海峡に展開する敵戦力を撃破せよ！

reward_other.name: 艦本新設計 増設バルジ(中型艦)

title: Armored Heavy Cruiser, Rush into the Iron Bottom Sound!
desc: Sortie Zara Due as Fleet 1 flagship to [W5-3]. A-Rank+ the boss node.
memo: Rewards a New Design Anti-Torpedo Bulge (Medium)

name: 南西諸島方面の敵艦隊を撃破せよ！
detail:
軽巡を旗艦とした艦隊を編成し、南西諸島防衛線、バシー島沖及び
東部オリョール海に展開、同海域に遊弋する敵艦隊を撃破せよ！
title: Crush the Enemy Fleet in the Nansei Islands Region!
desc: Sortie a CL as flagship and 5 additional ships to [W1-4], [W2-2] and [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss nodes of each.
memo: Rewards a Mamiya and an Irako

name: 洋上航空戦力を拡充せよ！
detail:
航空母艦、または水上機母艦を旗艦とした有力な艦隊を編成、北方AL海域、
西方海域カスガダマ沖 、中部海域MS諸島沖に展開し、各海域の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
title: Expand the Offshore Aviation Forces!
desc: Sortie a CV/CVB/CVL/AV as flagship and 5 additional ships [W3-5], [W4-4] and [W6-2]. S-Rank the boss nodes of each.
memo: Rewards a Skilled Crew Member

name: 改装航空巡洋艦、出撃！
detail:
改装航空巡洋艦「鈴谷改二」を旗艦とした精強な艦隊を編成、同艦隊を南方海域に展開、
南方海域前面、及びサブ島沖海域に遊弋する敵艦隊群を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！

choices.name: 艦本新設計 増設バルジ(中型艦)

title: Remodeled Aviation Cruiser, Sortie!
desc: Sortie Suzuya Kai Ni (not CVL) as flagship to [W5-1] and [W5-3]. A-Rank+ the boss nodes of each. You will be prompted to select a reward.
memo:
NOTICE The CVL remodel cannot complete this quest. Suzuya must be a CAV.
Rewards 4 Screws and either a Kyoufuu Kai OR a New Kanhon Design Anti-torpedo Bulge (Medium)

name: 改装攻撃型軽空母、前線展開せよ！
detail:
改装航空母艦「鈴谷航改二」を旗艦とした精強な機動部隊を編成、同艦隊を中部海域に進出。
MS諸島沖、KW環礁沖海域に展開し、同海域の敵機動部隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
title: Remodeled Light Attack Carrier, Deploy to the Front Lines!
desc: Sortie Suzuya-Kou Kai Ni (not CAV) as flagship to [W6-2] and [W6-5]. S-Rank the boss nodes of each.
memo: Rewards a Type 0 Fighter Model 63 (Fighter-bomber) and a 8cm High-angle Gun Kai + Extra Machine Guns

name: 鎮守府海域警戒を厳とせよ！
detail:
巡洋艦クラスを旗艦に配備、2隻以上の駆逐艦を擁する警戒艦隊を編成せよ。同警戒艦隊を以て、
鎮守府海域(南西諸島/製油所地帯沿岸/南西諸島防衛線/鎮守府近海)の警戒任務にあたれ！
title: Vigilantly Patrol the Waters of the Naval Base!
desc: Sortie a CL/CA(V) as flagship and at least 2 DD in any suitable fleet composition to [W1-2], [W1-3], [W1-4] and [W1-5]. A-Rank+ the boss nodes of each.
memo: Rewards 2 Irako and a Furniture Fairy

name: 戦果拡張任務！「Z作戦」前段作戦
detail:
戦果拡張作戦：我が第一艦隊に精鋭艦艇を集中配備、同精鋭艦隊を以て、南西諸島の沖ノ島海域、
中部海域哨戒線、グアノ環礁沖の敵艦隊を撃破、中部北海域ピーコック島の敵戦力を破砕殲滅せよ！
title: Quarterly Ranking Points 1
desc: Sortie Fleet 1 to [W2-4], [W6-1] and [W6-3] and A-Rank+ the boss nodes of each. Sortie to [W6-4] and S-Rank the boss node.
memo:
Battle Results Extension Mission! "Operation Z", Preliminary Operation
Rewards 3 Irako, 4 Screws and 350 Ranking Points

name: 海上護衛体制の強化に努めよ！
detail:
海上護衛作戦：駆逐艦または海防艦3隻以上を含む護衛艦隊を編成し、鎮守府海域の製油所地帯沿岸、
南西諸島防衛線、鎮守府近海、鎮守府近海航路にそれぞれ展開、各海域における作戦を成功させよ！
title: Strive to Reinforce the Coast Guard's Logistics!
desc: Sortie at least 3 DD/DE to [W1-3], [W1-4], [W1-5] and [W1-6]. S-Rank the boss nodes of each where applicable. Reach node N of [W1-6] once.
memo: Rewards a Furniture Fairy

name: 新編「第一戦隊」、抜錨せよ！
detail:
新編「第一戦隊」出撃任務：戦艦「長門改二」を旗艦、二番艦に「陸奥改」を配備した第一艦隊で出撃！
カレー洋リランカ島沖、サーモン海域北方に展開し、同海域の敵艦隊主力を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！

reward_other.name: 艦本新設計 増設バルジ(大型艦)

title: 1st Battleship Division, Set Sail!
desc: Sortie Nagato Kai Ni as Fleet 1 flagship, Mutsu Kai as second ship, and 4 additional ships to [W4-5] and [W5-5]. S-Rank the boss nodes of each.
memo: Rewards 4 Screws and a New Design Anti-Torpedo Bulge (Large)

name: 増強海上護衛総隊、抜錨せよ！
detail:
出撃任務：軽巡1隻以上、駆逐艦または海防艦2隻以上、さらに航空巡洋艦または軽空母で増強した
第一護衛艦隊を第一艦隊に編成、南西諸島海域の各海域に展開、敵艦隊を撃破、各作戦を成功させよ！
title: Enhanced Naval Escort Fleet, Set Sail!
desc: Sortie Fleet 1 with a CL, 2 DD/DE, 1 CAV/CVL and 2 other ships to [W2-2], [W2-3], [W2-4] and [W2-5]. A-Rank+ the boss nodes of each.
memo: Rewards either a Medal OR a New Model Artillery Armament Materials.

name: 新編「第七戦隊」、出撃せよ！
detail:
出撃任務：新編「第七戦隊」を出撃！　カレー洋リランカ島沖「深海東洋艦隊漸減作戦」、
MS諸島沖「MS諸島防衛戦」において、敵艦隊主力を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
title: New 7th Cruiser Division, Sortie!
desc: Sortie Kumano Kai Ni (or Kou) as Fleet 1 flagship, Suzuya Kai Ni (or Kou) as 2nd ship, Mogami Kai, Mikuma Kai and 2 other ships to [W4-5] and [W6-2]. S-Rank the bosses.
memo: Rewards 4 Screws and either a Medal OR a New Model Artillery Armament Materials OR a Type 0 Fighter Model 63 (Fighter-bomber).

name: 精鋭「第四航空戦隊」、抜錨せよ！
detail:
精鋭「第四航空戦隊」出撃任務：精鋭航空戦艦を主戦力に再編された「第四航空戦隊」、抜錨せよ！
沖ノ島沖戦闘哨戒及び北方AL海域戦闘哨戒を実施、同方面の敵艦隊主力を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！
title: Elite 4th Carrier Division, Set Sail!
desc: Sortie Lv.50+ Hyuuga and Lv.50+ Ise as flagship and second ship, 1 CL, 2 DD and 1 additional ship to [W2-5] and [W3-5]. A-Rank+ the boss nodes of each.
memo:
Either Ise or Hyuuga can be flagship.
Rewards 4 Screws and either a Medal OR a Skilled Crew Member.

name: 旗艦「由良」、抜錨！
detail:
出撃任務：旗艦に「由良改二」、随伴艦に二駆「村雨」「夕立」「春雨」「五月雨」及び「秋月」から
二隻以上を配備した第一艦隊を展開、東部オリョール海及び南方海域前面の敵戦力を撃滅せよ！
title: Flagship Yura, Set Sail!
desc: Sortie Yura Kai Ni as Fleet 1 flagship, at least 2 of Akizuki, Yuudachi, Murasame, Harusame or Samidare, and 3 others to [W2-3] and [W5-1]. S-Rank the boss nodes.
memo: Rewards a Skilled Crew Member and either a Daihatsu Landing Craft OR a Reinforcement Expansion.

name: 強行輸送艦隊、抜錨！
detail:
航路護衛任務：航空戦艦(または補給艦でも可)2隻を中核とした艦隊で、鎮守府近海航路における
輸送船団護衛作戦を実施。同輸送護衛作戦を2回成功させよ！
title: Quarterly [W1-6]
desc: Sortie 2 BBV/AO and up to 4 additional ships to [W1-6]. Reach node N twice.
memo:
Enforcement Transport Fleet, Set Sail!

name: 前線の航空偵察を実施せよ！
detail:
偵察任務：水上機母艦1隻と軽巡2隻を中核とした偵察艦隊を、中部海域グアノ環礁沖海域に展開、
航空偵察作戦「K作戦」を反復実施せよ！さらに同方面の敵艦隊を捕捉、敵戦力の撃破に努めよ！
title: Quarterly [W6-3]
desc: Sortie 1 AV, 2 CL and up to 3 additional ships to [W6-3]. A-Rank+ the boss node twice.
memo:
Carry Out Aerial Reconnaissance of the Front Lines!
Rewards 4 Screws

name: 精鋭「第二二駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
detail:
出撃任務：再編した精鋭「第二二駆逐隊」を含む精強な水雷戦隊で北方海域キス島沖に出撃、
キス島撤退作戦を完全成功させよ！
title: Sortie the Elite 22nd Destroyer Division!
desc: Sortie Fumizuki Kai Ni, Satsuki Kai Ni, Minazuki Kai, Nagatsuki Kai and up to 2 additional ships to [W3-2]. S-Rank the boss node.
memo: Rewards 2 Irako and either a Daihatsu Landing Craft OR a New Model Artillery Armament Materials OR a Reinforcement Expansion.

name: 精強大型航空母艦、抜錨！
detail:
出撃任務：「Saratoga Mk.II」または同「Mod.2」を旗艦とした「任務部隊」で、南方海域サーモン海域
北方及び中部海域MS諸島沖に展開、同海域敵戦力を捕捉撃滅、「MS諸島防衛戦」を成功させよ！
title: Powerful Large-Scale Aircraft Carrier, Setting Sail!
desc: Sortie Saratoga Mk.II or Mod.2 as Fleet 1 flagship, 1 CL, 2 DD and up to 2 additional ships to [W5-5] and [W6-2]. S-Rank the boss nodes.
memo:
Rewards:
First choice: Either a F6F-3 OR a Skilled Crew Member OR a New Model Aviation Armament Materials
Second choice: Either a TBF OR a Night Operations Aviation Personnel

name: 夜間作戦空母、前線に出撃せよ！
detail:
出撃任務：「Saratoga Mk.II」を旗艦とした第一艦隊を KW環礁沖海域に展開、敵機動部隊を迎撃！
「空母機動部隊迎撃戦」を見事成功させよ！　夜戦作戦空母、抜錨！　前線に出撃せよ！

choices.name: 夜間作戦航空要員+熟練甲板員

title: Night Operations Carrier, Sortie to the Frontlines!
desc: Sortie Saratoga Mk.II (NOT Mod.2) as Fleet 1 flagship to [W6-5]. S-Rank the boss node.
memo:
Rewards:
First choice: Either a TBF OR a New Model Aviation Armament Materials OR a Night Operations Aviation Personnel + Skilled Deck Hands
Second choice: Either a Reinforcement Expansion OR a New Model Aviation Armament Materials OR a Skilled Crew Member

name: 補給線の安全を確保せよ！
detail:
軽巡クラスの艦隊旗艦と2隻以上の駆逐艦または海防艦を中核とした警戒艦隊を編成、同艦隊で
鎮守府海域(製油所地帯沿岸/南西諸島防衛線/鎮守府近海)の警戒と補給線安全確保にあたれ！
title: Secure the Safety of the Supply Lines!
desc: Sortie a CL as flagship, 2 DD/DE and up to 3 other ships to [W1-3], [W1-4] and [W1-5]. A-Rank+ the boss nodes of each.
memo: Rewards an Underway Replenishment and an Irako

name: 「第八駆逐隊」、南西へ！
detail:
第八駆逐隊任務：「第八駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で、鎮守府海域南西諸島沖、及び南西諸島海域バシー島沖に
展開！同海域に跳梁する敵艦隊戦力を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
title: 8th Destroyer Division, to the Southwest!
desc: Sortie Arashio, Asashio, Ooshio, Michishio and up to 2 other ships to [W1-2] and [W2-2]. S-Rank the boss nodes of each.
memo: Rewards a Mamiya

name: 最精鋭「第八駆逐隊」、全力出撃！
detail:
第八駆逐隊任務：最精鋭「第八駆逐隊」を中核戦力とした艦隊を編成、北方海域キス島沖、及び
南方海域サーモン海域に突入！同海域の敵艦隊を撃滅、第八駆逐隊による完全勝利を刻め！
title: Supreme 8th Destroyer Division, Sortie With All Your Might!
desc: Sortie Arashio Kai Ni, Asashio Kai Ni (or D), Ooshio Kai Ni, Michishio Kai Ni and up to 2 other ships to [W3-2] and [W5-4]. S-Rank the boss nodes of each.
memo: Rewards 4 Screws and either a 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai Ni OR a Daihatsu Landing Craft OR a Type 22 Surface Radar

name: 北方海域警備を実施せよ！
detail:
北方海域警備任務：北方海域の警備を実施する。軽巡を1隻以上含む艦隊で、北方海域モーレイ海、
キス島沖、アルフォンシーノ方面に艦隊を展開、北方海域方面の警備と制海権確保に努めよ！
title: Quarterly [W3]
desc: Sortie a CL and up to 5 additional ships to [W3-1], [W3-2] and [W3-3]. A-Rank+ the boss nodes of each.
memo:
Secure the Defense of the Northern Region!
Rewards a Combat Ration and either a Furniture Fairy OR a +3 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai Ni OR a Medal

name: 北方海域戦闘哨戒を実施せよ！
detail:
北方海域戦闘哨戒任務：北方AL海域に軽空母と水上機母艦及び軽巡を基幹戦力とした精鋭艦隊を投入。
北方戦闘哨戒を反復実施、同方面の敵増援部隊主力を捕捉、これを撃滅し、北方海域戦線を防衛せよ！
title: Execute a Combat Patrol of the Northern Region!
desc: Sortie a CL, an AV, a CVL and up to 3 additional ships to [W3-5]. S-Rank the boss node twice.
memo: Rewards a present box and either 2 Shiden Kai Ni OR 4 Screws OR a New Model Aviation Armament Materials

name: 精鋭「三一駆」、鉄底海域に突入せよ！
detail:
強行東京急行任務：精鋭「三一駆」第一小隊を護衛戦力とした突入艦隊を編成、南方サーモン海域に投入。
鉄底海峡に突入し、同海域に展開する敵艦艇を実力で排除、強行鼠輸送作戦を反復完遂せよ！

desc: Sortie Naganami Kai Ni as flagship, one of Takanami Kai, Asashimo Kai or Okinami Kai, and up to 4 additional ships to [W5-4]. S-Rank the boss node twice.
memo:
Elite DesDiv 31, Break Into the Iron Bottom Sound!
Rewards:
First choice: Either 2 Type 13 Air Radars OR 2 Type 22 Surface Radars OR an Action Report
Second choice: Either a New Model Artillery Armament Materials OR a Present Box

name: 松輸送作戦、開始せよ！
detail:
防衛ラインの強化のため、艦隊旗艦「龍田改二」または「龍田改」、3隻以上の駆逐艦または海防艦を
含む輸送護衛艦隊を編成、南西諸島防衛線及び鎮守府近海航路における作戦を複数回成功させよ！

memo:
You may use up to 2 additional ships of any class.
Rewards:
First choice: Either a New Model Artillery Armament Materials OR a New Model Aviation Armament Materials
Second choice: Either a Furniture Fairy OR a Daihatsu Landing Craft OR an Action Report

「村雨改二」旗艦含む精鋭四水戦(4Sd)より4隻(他主力艦2隻)計6隻の精鋭艦隊を南方海域に展開。
南方海域前面、サブ島沖海域、サーモン海域に突入、同南方海域方面の敵艦隊を撃破せよ！

desc: Sortie Murasame Kai Ni as flagship and 3+ of Yura Kai Ni, Yuudachi Kai Ni, Harusame Kai, Samidare Kai or Akizuki Kai to [W5-1], [W5-3] and [W5-4]. A-Rank+ the bosses.
memo:
You can bring up to two additional ships. that blocks the reward selection screen.

First choice: Either a 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai Ni OR 2 Type 22 Surface Radars OR 2 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model B Kai Nis
Second choice: Either 2 Underway Replenishments OR 3 Drum Canisters OR 4 Screws

name: 松輸送作戦、継続実施せよ！
detail:
「艦隊旗艦に軽巡級または駆逐艦、さらに3隻以上の駆逐艦または海防艦を含む輸送護衛艦隊を編成、
防衛ラインの強化のため、南西諸島防衛線及び鎮守府近海航路における作戦を継続的に成功させよ！

desc: Sortie a CL(T)/CT/DD as flagship and 3 or more additional DE/DD to [W1-4] and [W1-6]. A-Rank+ the [W1-4] boss node three times. Reach [W1-6] node N three times.
memo:
You may use up to 2 additional ships of any class. that blocks the reward selection screen.
Rewards:
First choice: Either a Daihatsu Landing Craft OR 3 Screws
Second choice: Either a New Model Artillery Armament Materials OR two 12cm 30-tube Rocket Launchers OR a Furniture Fairy

name: 新編「四航戦」、全力出撃！
detail:
「航空戦艦「伊勢改」「日向改」及び軽巡「大淀改」と1隻以上の駆逐艦を含む新編第四航空戦隊を編成、
鎮守府近海航路、沖ノ島沖及び北方AL海域戦闘哨戒、カレー洋リランカ島沖の作戦に投入せよ！

memo:
that blocks the reward selection screen.
Rewards a 12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher Kai Ni and either a New Model Artillery Armament Materials OR an Action Report

memo:
that blocks the reward selection screen.

First choice: Either a Furniture Fairy OR a New Model Artillery Armament Materials
Second choice: Either an Action Report OR a Medal

title: DesDiv 18, to Kis Island in the Northern Seas!
desc: Sortie Arare Kai Ni, Kasumi Kai Ni (or B), Kagerou Kai, Shiranui Kai and up to 2 additional ships to [W3-2]. S-Rank the boss node twice.
memo:
that blocks the reward selection screen.
Rewards either a Daihatsu Landing Craft OR a 10cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount Kai + Additional Machine Guns OR 5 Screws

detail: 「黒潮改二」「不知火改二」「陽炎改二」のいずれかを旗艦、他2隻の練度75以上の甲型駆逐艦を配備した計6隻艦隊で西方カレー洋、北方キス島沖、南方サブ島沖海域に複数回突入、各作戦を完全成功させよ！

memo:
You may bring up to 3 additional ships.
Rewards:
First choice: Either a Furniture Fairy OR a New Model Artillery Armament Materials OR an Action Report
Second choice: Either two Medals OR a Prototype Flight Deck Catapult OR a 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model D Kai Ni

detail: 改装航空戦艦（戦闘航空母艦）一番艦、旗艦「伊勢改二」を中核とした航空火力打撃部隊を編成、北方AL海域戦闘哨戒、カレー洋リランカ島沖及びピーコック島沖の作戦に投入、敵を撃滅せよ！
title: Battle Carrier, Sortie!
desc: Sortie Ise Kai Ni as flagship and up to 5 additional ships to [W3-5], [W4-5] and [W6-4]. S-Rank the boss nodes.
memo:
Rewards:
First choice: Either a Skilled Crew Member OR a New Model Aviation Armament Materials OR 4 Screws
Second choice: Either a Zuiun (634 Air Group) OR a Suisei Model 22 (634 Air Group) OR two New Model Artillery Armament Materials

memo:
Rewards:
First choice: Either three Type 96 Fighters OR three Type 99 Dive Bombers OR two Type 0 Fighter Model 21s
Second choice: Either two Shiden Kai Ni OR a Medal OR an Action Report

name: 精鋭「第十八戦隊」、展開せよ！
detail: 精鋭「第十八戦隊」随伴駆逐艦2隻を含む艦隊を、鎮守府海域に展開。同南西諸島沖海域、南西諸島防衛線、鎮守府近海、鎮守府近海航路の各作戦を完全成功させよ！改装軽巡「天龍」「龍田」、出撃！

memo:
Rewards:
First choice: Either 5 Buckets OR an Action Report
Second choice: Either 2 Type 22 Surface Radars OR 4 Screws

name: 新編成「三川艦隊」、鉄底海峡に突入せよ！
detail: 鉄底海峡戦果拡張：「鳥海」「青葉」「衣笠」「加古」「古鷹」「天龍」「夕張」の中から4隻を含む突入艦隊を編成。南方海域前面及びサブ島沖海域、サーモン海域に突入、敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
title: Quarterly Ranking Points 2
desc: Sortie any four of Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, Yuubari and up to 2 additional ships to [W5-1], [W5-3] and [W5-4]. S-Rank the boss nodes.
memo:
New Mikawa Fleet, Break into the Iron Bottom Sound!
Rewards a Medal OR 5 Screws and 200 Ranking Points

name: 精鋭「二七駆」第一小隊、出撃せよ！
detail: 「白露改二」及び「時雨改二」から成る精鋭駆逐隊「二七駆」第一小隊を含む有力な艦隊を編成、東部オリョール海、ジャム島攻略作戦、サーモン海域北方、KW環礁沖海域に出撃、敵を撃滅せよ！
